programme.title: WSL Surf Abu Dhabi Pro
programme.desc: Take an access-all-areas tour of the Abu Dhabi Pro, as the 2025 WSL Championship Tour unleashes in the UAE.

programme.title: Red Bull Dual Ascent
programme.desc: Sixteen world-class athletes on eight teams battle to be the fastest up a wall of six gruelling pitches.

programme.title: Momentum: Angie Scarth-Johnson
programme.desc: Spend a year touring the world with Australia’s Angie Scarth-Johnson as she pushes the boundaries of climbing.

programme.title: Red Bull Dual Ascent – highlights
programme.desc: World-class climbers in 10 teams battled to be the fastest up the wall during a head-to-head 180m-high ascent.

programme.title: Beneath the Ice
programme.desc: Will Gadd uses his unmatched ice climbing skills and knowledge to lead a scientific expedition into a previously unexplored territory beneath the Greenland ice sheet.

programme.title: Magic backpacks
programme.desc: BASE jumpers Hayley Ashburn and Marshall Miller ascend and leap from a massive stone tower in Moab, Utah, USA.

programme.title: Drive Thru California
programme.desc: Donavon Frankenreiter, Timmy Curran, Greg Browning and Shawn Barron journey down the coast of California.

programme.title: Wings for Life World Run: Inside the Biggest Race
programme.desc: Wings for Life World Run is a global sports and charity phenomenon, and it unites people worldwide.

programme.title: Black Pearl
programme.desc: At 42, Chris Sharma conquers Black Pearl in Mallorca – his toughest deep water solo climb yet.

programme.title: The puzzle
programme.desc: Brette Harrington climbs the Chinese Puzzle Wall, completing a route begun by her late partner, Marc-André.

programme.title: Charles at large
programme.desc: Barefoot boulderer Charles Albert conquers his hardest route – L'Ombre du Voyageur in Switzerland.

programme.title: Dropping Molly
programme.desc: Climber Molly Mitchell pursues a rare, all-gear ascent of Boulder Canyon's dangerous Crank-it.

programme.title: Infinita Patagonia
programme.desc: Nadine Wallner ventured to the rarely skied location of El Chaltén, Argentina, for some serious alpinism.

programme.title: Behind the scenes at Red Bull Hardline Australia
programme.desc: Host Caroline Buchanan goes behind the scenes with riders ahead of Red Bull Hardline Australia 2025.

programme.title: Wee day out
programme.desc: Danny MacAskill tears around rural Scotland, setting out to capture the simple fun of a ride in the country.

programme.title: Riyadh Premier Padel highlights
programme.desc: Watch the highlights from Saudia Arabia as the Riyadh Premier Padel P1 took centre stage.

programme.title: Gijón Premier Padel highlights
programme.desc: Watch the highlights from Spain as the Gijón Premier Padel P2 took centre stage.

programme.title: Cancun Premier Padel highlights
programme.desc: Watch the highlights from Mexico as the Cancun Premier Padel P2 took centre stage.

programme.title: Miami Premier Padel highlights
programme.desc: Watch the action from the Miami Premier Padel P1 as it joined the padel tournament for the first time in 2025.

programme.title: DH recap show – Lenzerheide
programme.desc: Catch up on all the DH action from Lenzerheide, the halfway point of the UCI Mountain Bike World Cup 2022.

programme.title: 20 Years of Red Bull Valparaíso Cerro Abajo
programme.desc: Relive 20 years of the largest urban downhill race in the world that began as an idea among friends.

programme.title: Best of Bolton – Sea to Sky
programme.desc: Ride with extreme enduro rider Paul Bolton alongside Hard Enduro heroes fighting for the win at Sea to Sky.

programme.title: ABC of... Hard Enduro
programme.desc: Take a down-and-dirty crash course in all things Hard Enduro, motocross's toughest discipline.

programme.title: In the Wings
programme.desc: Formula One driver Liam Lawson builds his F1 resume in his busiest season yet in 2023.

programme.title: WSL Lexus Pipe Pro wrap show
programme.desc: Barron Mamiya and Tyler Wright won the Lexus Pipe Pro. The WSL broadcast crew break down how it went down.
